title: cinte yAkO
sahitya:
cinte yAkO ninna nAma enage ananta kOTi


anupallavi

  entu ninna pUjegaLa mADUvOdayya


caraNam 1    pavitrOdagati pAda pUjeya mADEnendare A vimala gange ninna pAdOdaka nava 
kusumava tandu samarpisuvenendare bhavava mADiso ninna pokkaLa pUvO bommanu
    caraNam 2    dIpa beLaguvene ninna kaNgLu sapt dvIpangaLanellava beLagutive 
AbhOshana mAtrava koDuvenendare ninage AbhOshanagidyeravAyitayya ambhOdhi
    caraNam 3    kANikiyanittAdaru kai mugivenendare rANI vAsavu siridEvi ninna mANadenna 
manadoLu nindu ninagAdare ninna prANA dhAranAgirayya purandara viTTala
